珇字的基本解释

珇
zǔ
琮玉上的凸起的花纹：“看珇似浮云。”
美好：“耳环、腕钏、约指，多以金银、珊瑚、珠宝为之，矜尚珇丽。”

珇
jù
玉名。
玉的纹理。

珇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǔ］
［《廣韻》則古切，上姥，精。］
(1)美好。
(2)珪琮上雕刻的凸起花纹。

珇字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　珇； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页729第20
【唐韻】則古切【集韻】【韻會】總古切【正韻】總五切，?音祖。【說文】琮玉之瑑。【廣韻】珪上起也。【增韻】珪琮之瑑凸起也。　又或作駔。【周禮·冬官考工記】駔琮五寸，宗后以爲權。駔琮七寸，鼻寸有半寸，天子以爲權。　又【揚子·方言】好也，美也。　又【集韻】在呂切，音咀。玉文。

珇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
珇字的起名意思

琮玉上的凸起的花纹；美好；玉名。玉的纹理。

Yu
Basic explanation of words
Yu
zǔ
The raised pattern on Congyu: "Looks like clouds."
Beautiful: "Earrings, wrist studs, and fingers are mostly made of gold, silver, coral, and jewellery. They are still beautiful."
Yu
jù
Jade name.
The texture of jade.
Yu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zǔ]
["Guangyun" is ancient cut, grandma, fine. ]
(1) Beautiful.
(2) The raised pattern carved on the Guicong.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　珇; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 729 No. 20
[Tang Yun] Ze Gu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Total Ancient Cut [Zheng Yun] Total five cuts,? Yin Zu. [Said the text] Cong Yuzhizhen. [Guang Yun] Going up. [Zengyun] Guicong’s ridge is also raised.　Or as a messenger. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] Di Cong was five inches long, and the queen thought it was right. The emperor thinks that Tuan Cong is seven inches, and his nose is half an inch.　[Yangtze Dialect] Good and beautiful.　 [Ji Yun] In Lu Qi, Yinzui. Yuwen.
